tool_description: Extracts and standardizes Indicators of Compromise (IoCs) from raw threat intelligence data using pattern matching and parsing techniques.

raw_data.description: Raw threat intelligence data to extract IoCs from

ioc_types.description: Types of IoCs to extract (IP, domain, hash, email, URL, registry)

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for extracted IoCs (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid raw data format: Raw data must be properly formatted strings
Unsupported IoC type: One or more specified IoC types are not supported
Confidence threshold out of range: Threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Parsing error: Unable to parse one or more raw data entries
No IoCs extracted: No valid IoCs found in the provided data
usage: Provide raw threat data and specify IoC types to extract. Set confidence threshold to filter low-quality indicators.

extracted_iocs.description: List of extracted and standardized IoCs

extraction_confidence.description: Confidence scores for each extracted IoC
